text: Heterodactylus imbricatus, the Rio de Janeiro teiid, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Heterodactylus Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 1825 Category:Taxa named by Johann Baptist von Spix
title: Heterodactylus imbricatus
